dcterms:creator: L. Deng
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digit images used for machine learning research, widely recognized for its role in training and testing various algorithms in the field of computer vision.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: G. B. Huang
M. Ramesh
T. Berg
E. Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: A database for studying face recognition in unconstrained environments, containing labeled images of various individuals, useful for training and evaluating face recognition algorithms.
dcterms:title: LFW (Labeled Faces in the Wild)
